languages.text: "Бесстрашно ступают верующие вперед, невзирая на ужасы вселенной, искусы Архиврага... и жуткую вонь, помилуй меня Император".
"Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."
languages.original_text: "Бесстрашно ступают верующие вперед, невзирая на ужасы вселенной, искусы Архиврага... и жуткую вонь, помилуй меня Император".

traits.locale_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."
"Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."
"Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."
"Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

languages.text: “忠诚之人将会无畏地踏上征途，无视宇宙的恐怖，无视混沌大敌的引诱……还有那可怕的臭味。愿帝皇原谅我。”
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: “忠诚之人将会无畏地踏上征途，无视宇宙的恐怖，无视混沌大敌的引诱……还有那可怕的臭味。愿帝皇原谅我。”

languages.text: «Los fieles caminan sin miedo, ignorando los horrores del universo, las tentaciones del Archienemigo... y, que el Emperador me perdone, esa espantosa peste».
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: «Los fieles caminan sin miedo, ignorando los horrores del universo, las tentaciones del Archienemigo... y, que el Emperador me perdone, esa espantosa peste».

languages.text: 「恐れることなく信念を胸に突き進む。宇宙の恐ろしさ、渾沌の勢力からの誘い…そしてこのひどい悪臭もなんのそのと…皇帝よ、勘弁してください」
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: 「恐れることなく信念を胸に突き進む。宇宙の恐ろしさ、渾沌の勢力からの誘い…そしてこのひどい悪臭もなんのそのと…皇帝よ、勘弁してください」

languages.text: "Furchtlos schreiten die Gläubigen voran, ungeachtet der Schrecken des Universums, der Versuchungen des Erzfeinds ... und dieses furchtbaren Gestanks, der Imperator verzeihe mir."
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: "Furchtlos schreiten die Gläubigen voran, ungeachtet der Schrecken des Universums, der Versuchungen des Erzfeinds ... und dieses furchtbaren Gestanks, der Imperator verzeihe mir."

languages.text: « Les fidèles avancent sans crainte, sans se soucier des horreurs de l'univers, des tentations du Grand Ennemi... ou de cette terrible puanteur, que l'Empereur me pardonne. »
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: « Les fidèles avancent sans crainte, sans se soucier des horreurs de l'univers, des tentations du Grand Ennemi... ou de cette terrible puanteur, que l'Empereur me pardonne. »

languages.text: "İnançlılar; evrenin dehşetine, Şerbaşı'nın ayartmalarına ve... İmparator affetsin ama o leş kokuya aldırış etmeden, korkusuzca atar adımlarını."
languages.original_text: "Fearlessly do the faithful tread, heedless of the horrors of the universe, the Archenemy's temptations... and that terrible stench, Emperor forgive me."

traits.locale_text: "Evrenin dehşetine, Şerbaşı'nın ayartmalarına ve... İmparator affetsin, o leş kokuya aldırış etmeden atar inançlılar adımlarını korkusuzca."
